h:head.h:title: FFX A2 FOLLOW UP CASE VISIT

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Please enter the national ID number or the Passport number in the right format

input.label: **Form A2 Confirmed COVID-19 Case Form – Follow-Up Visit (Days 14-21)**
Unique Case ID :
input.hint: Enter the national ID number or the passport number

input.label: Name of data collector
input.hint: Please enter full names (First, Middle, Surname)

input.label: Data collector telephone number
input.hint: Please enter the phone number in the format 07xx xxx xxx or 01xx xxx xxx e.g. 0700123456 or 0100234567

input.label: Data collector e-mail
input.hint: Please enter valid email here e.g. jdoe@gmail.com

select1.label: What is the relationship of the person completing this interview to the patient?

input.label: If not Self – please list name of person completing the interview:
Patient First name
input.hint: Please state only the first name of the patient here.

input.label: Patient Family name
input.hint: Please state only the last name/surname/family of the patient here.

select1.label: Sex
select1.hint: Please state the sex of the patient here.

select1.label: Is the date of birth known?

input.label: Date of Birth
input.hint: Please state the date of birth of the patient in the format (dd/mm/yyyy) e.g. 01/01/1999

input.label: Unknown (Estimate age)
input.hint: If the exact date of birth cannot be identified then please indicate the estimated age

input.label: Mobile number
input.hint: Please enter the phone number in the format 07xx xxx xxx or 01xx xxx xxx e.g. 0700123456 or 0100234567

input.label: Alternative Mobile number
input.hint: Please enter the phone number in the format 07xx xxx xxx or 01xx xxx xxx e.g. 0700123456 or 0100234567

input.label: E-mail
input.hint: Please enter valid email here e.g. jdoe@gmail.com

select1.label: Nationality
select1.hint: indicate the Nationality of the patient here. e.g. Kenya

input.label: Physical Location
input.hint: Briefly describe the physical location where the interview is taking place e.g. Manyatta shopping center

select1.label: Is the village of residence different from the Interview location?
select1.hint: Please indicate whether or not the residence of the patient is different from the interview location identified above.

input.label: Physical Location
input.hint: Briefly describe the physical location where the interview is taking place e.g. Mamboleo shopping center

input.label: Village
input.hint: State the village where the interview is taking place e.g. Mamboleo village

input.label: Subcounty
input.hint: State the Subcounty in which the interview is taking place e.g. Kisumu East Sub-county

select1.label: County:
select1.hint: Please select from among listed counties of Kenya, the specific county where the interview is taking place

select1.label: Current Status of the patient
select1.hint: Is the patient still alive, dead or the status is not since the patient's whereabouts are not know or has become lost to follow-up?

group.label: 4. Symptoms associated with your coronavirus diagnosis

input.label: On what date were you told that you tested positive for COVID-19?

group.label: **In the 14 days after being diagnosed with COVID-19, did you have any of the following symptoms?**

input.label: Date Sore throat symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Runny nose symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Cough symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Shortness of breath symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Fever/hotness of body symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Chills symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Vomiting symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Nausea symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Diarrhoea symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Headache symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Rash symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Conjunctivitis symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Muscle aches symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Joint ache symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Loss of appetite symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Loss of smell (anosmia) or taste symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Nosebleed symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Fatigue symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Seizures symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Altered consciousness symptom started, if answer is 'yes'
Date Other neurological signs symptom started, if answer is 'yes'

select1.label: Did you have any other symptoms?
Do you have any other symptom?
Do you have any other symptom?

group.label: 5. Health seeking behaviour and severity of disease.

input.label: **Please answer the following questions for the since you were diagnosed with COVID-19**

select1.label: How many visits have you made to a traditional healer since you were diagnosed?
Did you attend a health facility since you were diagnosed?

input.label: Facility name:
input.hint: Please indicate the name of the facility the patient attended since being diagnosed with covid-19

select1.label: Did you attend any other health facility since you were diagnosed?

input.label: Facility name:
input.hint: Please indicate the name of the facility the patient attended since being diagnosed with covid-19

select1.label: Did you attend another health facility since you were diagnosed?

input.label: Facility name:
input.hint: Please indicate the name of the facility the patient attended since being diagnosed with covid-19

select1.label: Did you attend another health facility since you were diagnosed?

input.label: Facility name:
input.hint: Please indicate the name of the facility the patient attended since being diagnosed with covid-19

select1.label: Did you attend another health facility since you were diagnosed?

input.label: Facility name:
input.hint: Please indicate the name of the facility the patient attended since being diagnosed with covid-19

select1.label: Were you moved to another hospital after you were admitted?

input.label: Date transferred:
input.hint: Please indicate the the date the the patient was transferred from the hospital in the format dd-mm-yyyy

select1.label: Were you admitted to the hospital's intensive care unit (ICU)?
If hospitalized, did you have COVID-19 symptoms at discharge?

item.label: Did not have symptoms at discharge

select1.label: Were you ever told you had pneumonia?
If yes, were you given oxygen through a tube to your nose or through a mask?
Did you get put on a ventilator machine to help you breathe?
Did you have any other complications as a result of coronavirus infection?
Malaria rapid test done today?
select1.hint: Note: All RDT positive pregnant women should be referred for routine ANC care and malaria treatment

select1.label: If positive for malaria, was treatment given?
